validations.message: Only bold, italic, underline, and code marks are allowed
Only heading 1, heading 2, heading 3, heading 4, heading 5, heading 6, ordered list, unordered list, horizontal rule, quote, asset, link to Url, and block entry nodes are allowed
Only bold, italic, and underline marks are allowed
Only heading 2, heading 3, heading 4, heading 5, heading 6, unordered list, ordered list, link to Url, asset, and quote nodes are allowed
Only bold, italic, and underline marks are allowed
Only heading 2, heading 3, heading 4, heading 5, heading 6, unordered list, ordered list, quote, link to Url, and asset nodes are allowed
Only bold and italic marks are allowed
Only unordered list, ordered list, and link to Url nodes are allowed
Only bold and italic marks are allowed

settings.helpText: A description of the page for SEO purposes
If set, this will take priority over the "Link"
If "Entry Link" is specified, you can also specify a specific "Block" on that page here, to link directly to it
If specified, will take precedence over the "Image" when displayed as a thumbnail
If "Image Quote" is specified, this will the colour
If not specified, the latest 3 blog articles will be shown instead
If not specified, all blog articles will be shown.
If not specified, the latest 3 case studies will be shown instead
If not specified, all case studies will be shown.
